title: Video Metadata Extractor
description: Extract metadata, comments, and direct video URLs from YouTube, TikTok, and Twitter/X. Automatically uses Apify's residential proxy when needed (TikTok, Instagram).

url.title: Video URL
url.description: YouTube, TikTok, or Twitter/X video URL

extractComments.title: Extract Comments
extractComments.description: Also extract video comments (may take longer)

maxComments.title: Max Comments
maxComments.description: Maximum number of comments to extract (if extractComments is enabled)

downloadVideo.title: Download Video
downloadVideo.description: Include a video URL. For YouTube returns a direct link; for TikTok/Twitter downloads and stores in Apify's key-value store.

twitterCookiesFile.title: Twitter/X Cookies File
twitterCookiesFile.description: Path to a Netscape-format cookies file for Twitter/X (e.g. twitter_cookies.txt). Optional — the actor first tries the guest-token API (no login needed); cookies are only used as a fallback via Playwright.

tiktokCookiesFile.title: TikTok Cookies File
tiktokCookiesFile.description: Path to a Netscape-format cookies file for TikTok (e.g. tiktok_cookies.txt). Required to extract comments — TikTok now hides comments behind login for unauthenticated requests. Export via the 'Get cookies.txt LOCALLY' browser extension after logging into tiktok.com.
